title: Grants taxpayers an automatic extension to file a return and pay taxes in certain cases
summary: Grants taxpayer an automatic extension of time for filing a return and paying personal income taxes where a state budget is not timely enacted into law; provides that no penalties or interest shall be assessed, or imposed upon a taxpayer during such extension.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to granting an automatic extension of time for filing a personal income tax return and paying a personal income tax when the state budget has not been timely enacted into law
